title: Tottenham v Wolves: Premier League – live
summary: In a minute-by-minute report, Rob Smyth covers the match between struggling Wolves and high-flying Tottenham. The focus is on whether Wolves can regain their form against a strong opponent. The tension builds as both teams compete for crucial points.

title: Ryder Cup: USA 3½-8½ Europe – visitors extend lead after foursomes
summary: Live updates are ongoing from day two at Bethpage Black, where Europe is aiming to strengthen their lead. Coverage includes detailed hole-by-hole insights. Stay tuned for the latest developments from the tournament.

title: Strictly Come Dancing: week one – live
summary: Couples make their debut on the dance floor, showcasing their skills and enthusiasm. The excitement builds as viewers anticipate who will shine and who may struggle. Join us to follow their journey and experiences throughout the competition.

title: Australian defence force says ‘no place’ for extremists despite member’s link to neo-Nazi group
summary: A man continued his service for over eight months after details of his involvement in extremist activities surfaced. He has now been charged with possessing extremist material. The case raises concerns about the vetting and monitoring processes within the service.

title: The moment I knew: Adele was singing and tears rolled down my face. It felt as though the lyrics were about us
summary: Chelsea Angell and Cal, formerly 'flirty friends' at circus school, experienced a deep emotional connection during a performance at Glastonbury. This moment made Chelsea realize they were meant to be together. Their relationship has blossomed since then.
